resources.string: %1$s has been added to the dictionary
You have not added any translation. Write one and click on + icon

Start by adding your first dictionary.

For example: español-inglés, english-german, français-russie.

Take into account that the dictionary will be unidirectional. If you create spanish-english, you will have to create english-spanish if you need it.

You do not have any word yet in this dictionary.

Go to ADD section and add some new word to the dictionary

If you click on the dictionary name row, you will open the edition panel, which allows you to select, create and remove dictionaries.

You have just added your first word.

If you add more words, they will be picked at random in TEST section and you will check if you remember at least one translation

If you want to exclude some word from the TEST, but you want to keep it in the list, you can switch off the word by opening word edition panel (click on the row)
You do not have any dictionary yet.\n\nGo to LIST and add some new dictionary, then you will be able to add words to it.
You do not have any dictionary yet.\n\nGo to LIST and add some new dictionary, then you will be able to add words to it.

You do not have any word yet in this dictionary.

Go to ADD and add some new word to the dictionary

Then, you will be able to test if you remember its translations.
Shows the list of dictionaries you currently have
